title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Definition of Air Separation, Specification and Application of Constituents of Air, Introduction to Cryogenic Air Separation, Properties of Cryogenic Fluids, Mechanical and Thermal Properties of Materials at Cryogenic Temperatures, Linde and Clude Cycles of Liquefaction and their Derivatives, Theory of Cryogenic Distillation, Linde Single Column, Linde Double Column, Argon Separating Columns, Different Types of Air Separation Plants, Plants Producing Gaseous Products, Plants Producing Liquid Products, Mass and Energy Balance in a Cryogenic Air Separation Plants, Effects of changes of linlet Conditions on Plant Performance. Effects of Malfunctioning of Cooling Tower, Water Pumps, Compressor, Intercooler and Aftercooler, Refrigeration Systems, CO2 and Moisture removal systems, Expansion Devices, Cryogenic Pumps, Insulation, Storage Transfer and Transport Systems of Overall Plant Performance. Case studies, Safety in Air Separation Plants.
